titles.title: A joint resolution relating to the disapproval of the proposed export to the Government of Egypt of certain defense articles and services.
A joint resolution relating to the disapproval of the proposed export to the Government of Egypt of certain defense articles and services.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: This joint resolution prohibits the proposed sale of various weapons, ammunition, and related support services to the government of Egypt, as described in Transmittal No. 18-47 sent to Congress on November 28, 2018.
